subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Gilbert Arenas had 38 points and 8 assists as the Washington Wizards ended the visiting Dallas Mavericks’ 12-game winning streak with a 106-97 victory last night.
snippet: Gilbert Arenas had 38 points and 8 assists as the Washington Wizards ended the visiting Dallas Mavericks’ 12-game winning streak with a 106-97 victory last night.
